behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Hmm... Another one of those Unkindled, are you?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: All you faceless Undead, behaving as if you deserve respect.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Hmph. No matter. Heed my words.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: If you've any sense, you'll go find a coffin to huddle up inside.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
You here, in this land of Hollows,
you're like a frail maiden on the front lines.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: If like the others, you're fool enough to play the champion...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Then go on ahead, traipse right past the abandoned church.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: You'll face death, and it won't be pretty.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Enough death to leave you broken, time after time.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
#0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: If like the others, you're fool enough to play the champion...

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Then go on ahead, traipse right past the abandoned church.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text:
Hopeless, the whole lot of you.
Like little moths, flittering toward a flame.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
#0Talk-1st time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
subdialogue_text: You like poking around in cells, do you?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
subdialogue_text: How very genteel!

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
#0Talk-2nd time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
subdialogue_text: Ah-hah, taken an interest in her, have you?

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
subdialogue_text:
Well, she's a lost cause.
Couldn't even become a Fire Keeper.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
subdialogue_text:
After I brought her all this way,
and got her all ready.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
subdialogue_text: She's beyond repair, I tell you.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
#0Talk-3rd time after seeing Irina in the cell & having already talked to him
subdialogue_text: The woman's a lost cause.

subdialogue_text: Couldn't even become a Fire Keeper.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after visiting Irina's cell before speaking to Eygon
subdialogue_text: All you faceless Undead, behaving as if you deserve respect.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after visiting Irina's cell before speaking to Eygon
subdialogue_text: Now you're poking around in peoples' cells.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after visiting Irina's cell before speaking to Eygon
subdialogue_text: How very noble!

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after visiting Irina's cell before speaking to Eygon
#0Talk-1st time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: You've gone and rescued her, have you?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: How very quaint, pitying creatures that are beyond help.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after accepting Irina's service
#0Talk-1st time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: Very well. I'm sick of looking after her at any rate.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: I am Eygon, a knight of Carim.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: I am allied to you as long as you assure the girl's safety.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: And only for that long...

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: What's the matter? My terms are very simple.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after accepting Irina's service

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after accepting Irina's service
subdialogue_text: And only for that long...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Ahh, I know you. Been some time.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: I just dropped in to see how she's getting on.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Now, what are you playing at with this circus?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
This cesspool of
doddering oldfolk and degenerates.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Couldn't be better. She must fit in perfectly here.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-2nd time

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile
subdialogue_text: As many times as it takes!

subdialogue_text: Stay dead this time.

as long as you assured the girl's safety.
